name: Sel de Mer Hotel & Suites
address: 92 Vo Nguyen Giap, Son Tra , Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở thành phố Đà Nẵng, Sel de Mer Hotel & Suites cung cấp chỗ nghỉ bên bờ biển, cách Ngũ Hành Sơn 7 km và chỉ cách Bán đảo Sơn Trà 5 km. Khách sạn có nhiều tiện nghi khác nhau, như trung tâm thể dục, hồ bơi, quầy bar và sảnh khách chung.

Mỗi phòng nghỉ tại khách sạn đều có sân trong, bàn làm việc, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng. 

Chỗ nghỉ phục vụ bữa sáng tự chọn và kiểu lục địa hàng ngày.

Tại Sel de Mer Hotel & Suites, du khách có thể thoải mái sử dụng phòng xông hơi muối và phòng xông hơi ướt miễn phí.

Khách sạn có bàn đặt tour, dịch vụ cho thuê xe hơi và trung tâm dịch vụ doanh nhân, nơi có báo cho khách đọc.

Khách sạn cách Cầu Sông Hàn 2,2 km và Cầu tàu tình yêu 3,1 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách Sel de Mer Hotel & Suites 7 km và khách sạn cung cấp dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay có tính phí.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Cơ sở vật chất, thiết kế chất lượng. Nhân viên chuyên nghiệp và thân thiện, đặc biệt là ở quán bar sân thượng và nhà hàng, cùng chất lượng đồ uống (cocktail), thức ăn ngon, giá hợp lý đối với khách sạn 5 sao. Vị trí tuy có hơi xa trung tâm, nhưng chỉ bước qua đường là tới biển, chung quanh có nhiều lựa chọn hàng quán từ sang trọng cho tới bình dân.
review.comment_negative: Cần ra soát lại quy trình thủ tục nhận phòng phù hợp với một khách sạn ở đẳng cấp này. Mình có phản hồi với nhân viên lễ tân về trải nghiệm không thoải mái, và có câu trả lời thỏa đáng. Không phải lỗi của nhân viên mà là của quy trình.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố
review.comment_positive: Staff cortese e abbastanza disponibile. Pulizia molto buona. Spa ben fornita e massaggi eccellenti. Anche con un ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo.
review.comment_negative: Colazione varia, ma già da prima delle ore 9 inizia ad essere sfornita, se chiedi alcune cose vengono rifornite. Un giorno su tre si sono dimenticati di pulire la stanza, abbiamo chiesto in reception di poter avere almeno degli asciugamani. Una delle tre mattine alle 6,40 hanno iniziato fuori dall'hotel a cantare al karaoke, e le stanze sono insonorizzate malissimo, quindi era come averlo in stanza. Anche i rumori delle altre stanze accanto e della strada si sentono a volume alto. Riuscire a prendere l'ascensore era una missione impossibile...

review.comment_positive: Big room and clean
review.comment_negative:
We were treated differently to other guests just because we dressed up casual (came back from Bana Hills), we didn't get welcome drinks while all other guests had, we had to carry luggage to the room by ourselves. We booked suite and paid expensive room to experience the reception staff who lack of service mind and low hospitality, wasted it. We are from tourism industry and will share this to our business partners among AP to better stay with the brand hotels who have well trained staff. 

Ps. The property itself is ok, only reception staff are untrained.

review.comment_positive: The staff are amazing.  Really, the staff here goes above and beyond to be helpful.  Outstanding.   The room was modern, comfortable, new, and exceptionally clean.  The hotel is just a little bit off the beaten path which is great because it is in a lot quieter spot, but close enough to everything you want or need with a 3 minute drive in a taxi or Grab.  This is a great hotel with a great staff.  I definitely recommend this hotel, and I will be staying there again the next time I am in Da Nang.

Modern contemporary rooms and clean. The entire City view in the evening was spectacular. Excellent staff service from check in to check out. Didn’t charge us a deposit and took care of our needs. 
The quieter end of the main strip, which meant we had the beach to ourselves for our morning swim. The most pristine water we had experienced for our whole time in Vietnam.

They arranged for us a driver to take us to all attractions that we wanted to visit in Da Nang, such as Marble Mountain, My Son Sanctuary, Coconut Village and Hoi An city! We couldn’t be more grateful for what they have done for us!
review.comment_negative: The room that we had stay (Superior King Room with Ocean View) needs renovation! Also I would suggest that one used slippers are provided to guests, rather than old used plastic slippers. Also, I would suggest more options for breakfast.

review.rating: Immaculate and lovely seaview hotel room
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The room is in immaculate condition, very clean and spacious.
We book a room for 3 nights with balcony facing the sea and the view is just lovely. 
Adequate training equipment in the gym for proper workout. There is also an infinity pool to just soak-in and relax while enjoying the beautiful scenery. 
Their rooftop Speakeasy Bar & Tapas at 26th floor is a must try. Beside the 360degree view, the bar also serves good foods and drinks at reasonable price. We ordered their teriyaki chicken skewer, nem lui (pork skewer) and baked oyster with cheese….yummy!
Last but not least, all the staffs are very friendly, professionally trained and speak good English. Special mention to Mr Tan Bao at Anemoi restaurant. So nice of him to go all the way to request the same baked oyster with cheese that we ordered the night before at rooftop bar even though this is not on the lunch menu. Thanks to the cook too for making such special arrangement on our last day! 
We will definitely stay here again whenever we are back to Danang.

review.rating: Beautiful and comfortable rooms in Da Nang!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
We had an incredible stay at Sel de Mer! I was previously staying at another property in Da Nang that did not meet our standards. We booked our room late at night to check in the following day. 
We left our previous property as soon as possible and checked in to Sel de Mer. The front desk staff let us check in our bags and go to the pool. We were able to get into our rooms early, and they left us a nice arrangement in our room for our honeymoon.
The AC was AWESOME. It worked exceptionally well, which is needed in Da Nang. The beds were so incredibly comfortable. The showers worked great, and the soaps smelled really good. We got a city view room, which was amazing to look out at everyday.
The breakfast buffet is excellent. There are great options, and it was very tidy, well-stocked, and organized. The pool and gym are gorgeous and overlook the water. The gym also had a great variety of equipment.
review.comment_negative: I will say that the location is a bit far from some local bars and restaurants. But that makes the property feel a bit more quiet and private. Getting a Grab is easy, so this was no no problem for us.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
This beachfront hotel is hosted in a modern tower. Everything from the design of the taxi apron, to the modern, roomy and quiet lobby, as well as common areas reflects a good care for details. 

Very polite and attentive staff, quick and reactive, yet kind and welcoming - a great example of Eastern hospitality.
We appreciated the welcome ice tea for all our party - much needed with 105°F outside!

We took a twin room with a sea view and a balcony - unobstructed view of the long beach of Da Nang, just super. The room was US-standard in size, rather big , with large bathroom, big TV screen, well designed and with a perfect and intuitive a/c control.

Breakfast is a highlight. Much choice of Vietnamese as well as western food, very good quality and presentation. Nice breakfast room, large and with no major odors. Apparently bottomless supply of food. Polite maitre constantly checking for quality and customer satisfaction.

The hotel is located to more quiet northern end of the strip, with a huge portion of the beach waiting for your early morning undisturbed bath :) Nice, quiet and reasonably big infinity pool, not on rooftop, in case you need some shadow. Large and nice gym nearby the pool. A taxi ride to/from the airport takes less than 15 minutes. Attractive Hoi An can be reached by taxi in less than 40 minutes.

Considering also the fare, I would say one of the best hotel stays I had over the last few years. We just felt welcome, relaxed, and stunned by the gorgeous view. Would totally recommend, and hope to be there again soon.

review.comment_positive: Чистый отель с хорошим персоналом
review.comment_negative:
Через дорогу находится караоке-кафе которое очень сильно шумит до 22:00. Мы жили на 17 этаже, и нам было слышно как будто поют в соседней комнате.
В отеле есть три лифта, но их порой не хватает для обслуживания всех жильцов, особенно это чувствуется во время завтрака.
Для отдыха на пляже отель ничего не предоставляет (зонт, лежаки и т.д) кроме полотенец.
Готовят в отеле не плохо, но нет разнообразия блюд. Особенно для тех, кто не ест свинину.
Этот отель не рекомендую для отдыхающих с детьми.

review.rating: ベトナム最高のビーチリゾート
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: オーシャンビュー，シティビューの各部屋に泊まる機会があったが，どちらも眺望がとてもよく，日中，暑くて外出できない時間帯にホテル室内にいても，気持ちよく過ごせた。朝食もベトナム料理，洋食，韓国料理等，バラエティ豊かなメニューがそろっており，毎日，メニューが変わるので，連泊しても楽しめる。滞在中，エステの割引があったため，お得にホテルエステを楽しむことが出来た。また，友人の一人が滞在中，体調不良になってしまった時も，体温計の貸し出し（但し，解熱剤等の薬は置いていない）のみならず，その情報がスタッフ間で共有され，どの時間帯のスタッフからもケアして頂いたことに感謝している。
review.comment_negative: プールサイドのチェアの数が少ないので，混んでいる場合は使えないこともある。本ホテルはミーケビーチよりもやや北に位置しているため，ミーケビーチ付近にたくさんある飲食店まではやや遠い（その代わり，静かな環境を楽しめる）。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Le personnel très attentionné et professionnel, la belle décoration aussi bien de l'hôtel que de notre chambre avec vue exceptionnelle sur l'océan, la localisation très pratique pour explorer la ville et ses alentours ou tout simplement aller à la plage. Magnifique séjour très relaxant !
review.comment_negative: Nous avons vraiment apprécié l'attention du personnel quant à notre petit déjeuner, où les options vegans nous ont été indiquées chaque matin : comme suggestion, un réel plus serait une sélection de pâtisseries ou gâteaux vegans pour le petit déjeuner où le café (par exemple comme ceux du restaurant Kurumi, situé non loin).

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
review.comment_positive:
Es war einfach alles perfekt und freundlich.
Ganz außergewöhnlich. Frühstücksbuffett war klasse. Unbedingt Zimmer mit Meerblick buchen. Phantastisch!
review.comment_negative: Leider gab es nichts, was nicht perfekt war

review.comment_negative: They make you feel like a criminal at checkout. As we were checking out, they asked us if we consumed anything out of the mini bar?  I said no, they had to send someone up to the room to verify, and this took 45 minutes.  As we were heading to the airport for a flight home, this was annoying. We would have left earlier. Just keep the card on file, and charge the room if I consumed anything. This was done at other Vietnam hotels, but not all.

review.comment_positive: Even though we only stayed for one night we had an exceptional experience. The room was spacious and clean, breakfast was great, rooftop bar was spectacular and beautifully decorated. Location is perfect if you want to enjoy Hanoi’s Old Quarters. But most of all we appreciated how kind and attentive the staff was. They definitely went above and beyond to cater our needs, help with transportation and even book a last minute massage. Big thanks to My Lee who made us feel very welcome and well taken care of.

review.comment_negative: Le petit déjeuner est fade et sans goût. Le riz mal cuit, viande trop grasse, viennoiseries qui font mal au ventre, je demande un thé je reçois un café... Et impossible d'importer son petit déjeuner dans la chambre alors que c'est possible partout ailleurs ?! Dommage pour ce genre de petit déjeuner pour ce genre d'hôtel. Je pense qu'une formule chambre sans petit déjeuner serait plus rentable.

review.comment_positive: Staff were incredible, we had a slight issue with noise from a connecting room during our first night, which reception sorted within minutes. We were then met at breakfast the next morning by the guest relations manager who was lovely and apologised again. The facilities were top notch, absolutely beautiful hotel and room with an amazing balcony.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố

review.rating: Very mixed experienced. Hotel is new and clean, majority
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
review.comment_positive: Overall the staff at the hotel are very pleasant, especially those at the the restaurant on level 2. We had a few meals during our 4 night stay there, service was great and the waitresses were really attentive to our needs.
review.comment_negative:
1. The noise. I asked to give us a quiet family room when we were checking in, as I haven’t had a good sleep for days in previous half of the trip in Hanoi. I was then told by the reception staff that they never had any complaint of noise from guests so I should not need to worry. It turned out that our beach view family room on level 8 was super noisy. The street traffic noise, the loud party music and karaoke for 2 consecutive nights from the restaurant or club across the street right in the beach, really negatively affected our entire experience. The balcony doors were not sound proof at all. When asking if possible to change to a quieter room, we were told the family room is only available up to Level 9 so changing room wouldn’t make any difference. I am not sure if that’s true, but we decided to stay put with this information from the reception staff. 
2. upon checking out, we were falsely blamed for breaking a glass in the room. Maybe just because we had 2 kids staying? I am 100% sure no glass was broken by us during our stay, it might be their cleaning staff who broke it during cleaning and blamed on us. Rushing to check out to catch our flight, my husband did not bother to argue and just paid for the mysteriously broken glass. However I am extremely disappointed by this.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
review.comment_positive: The hotel can be recommended in all respects: equipment, staff, service, breakfast, whatever.
review.comment_negative:
That the TV set is turned on automatically when inserting the keycard after entering the room is rather annoying.
The beach in front of the hotel is the dirtiest section within the bay. The garbage there is the  bycatch of the local fishermen, who leave it on the beach (and catch it again and again). The hotel and its neighbours Hilton, Sheraton and the like should definitely do something about it.

Wunderbares Hotel !
Die Lage: Front Row am Strand, aber am oberen Ende der strahlenden Bucht von Danang. Bis hierher kommt die Party nicht - das bedeutet: keine Lärmbelästigung durch Beachbars und Beachclubs direkt vorm Haus. 
Die Zimmer sind ausgesprochen groß und geräumig. Die Ausstattung ist sehr gut und in tadellosem Zustand. Augenzwinkernd haben wir zur Kenntnis genommen, dass das Bad komplett mit deutschen Armaturen ausgestattet ist ;)
Smart TV - Amazon Prime fähig
Das Personal ist wirklich sehr lieb und zuvorkommend.
Der Strand vorm Hotel ist ohne Bars, daher auch ohne Liegen - es werden jedoch große Strandtücher ausgegeben, für diejenigen, die ein Runde Schwimmen gehen wollen. Wer eine Liege mieten will bewegt sich ein Stück Richtung My Khe Beach - kein Problem
review.comment_negative: Zu wenig Liegemöglichkeiten am Pool. Die wenigen Plätze die es gibt sind ab morgens fest in koreanischer Hand - wir haben den Pool daher einfach nicht genutzt, wozu auch, wenn das südchinesische Meer direkt vor der Tür liegt

review.comment_positive: The room is very spacious. I like the design of bathroom. The swimming pool has an amazing view as well. All the staffs from front-desk to cleaners are very friendly, making me feel very welcomed.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The view of the ocean, the bed and pillow was nice. Overall room is very comfortable. 

The sauna was a plus.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately need to go out and stand at the corner of the balcony to see the mountain view.

I stayed on level 19 and could hear neighboring businesses blasting music at night - so just be prepared for some noise nuisances which may be unavoidable at times.

We felt some aspects of the room could have been designed better, for example, the sliding door that opens to the balcony could be collapsed instead of stacked to one side. Stacking it effectively blocked 1/3 of the view.  Also the shower does not have any place to put toiletries, we had to put the things on the floor.

Breakfast buffet egg station could do better. My sunny side up was soaked in oil, and the scrambled egg lacked the rich buttery flavor. Out of the eggs we tried, omelette was the best.

The hotel should place instructions on how to "on" the steam room. During my stay, if I needed to "on" it I had to ask a staff outside (so far is male) to enter the female toilet and help to "on" it. This left me feeling insecure during my use of the hot sauna that anytime a male could just walk in the female toilet to render assistance if needed.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The staffs were extremely welcoming and helpful. They ensured that everything were well taken care of and that we are comfortable with our stay. They gave us a free upgrade to a suite with ocean view seeing that we check in as a family of 4. The property was right infront of the ocean so the view from our room was breathtaking and awesome. There was even a kids corner in the hotel premises for my kids to play in. Would definitely stay here again if I were to come back to Da Nang in future.
review.comment_negative: The taste of the breakfast buffet food could be further improved.

Everything was amazing but there were a few minor details that could be improved on.
Firstly some of the reception staff weren't very warm and welcoming if anything they came across stuck up and if they were looking down on us as if we didn't belong. I had paid for one of the best rooms so I don't expect to feel this way. But please note that was only a few of the staff members. The spa staff were very kind.
Secondly, this is very small but being a 5 star hotel it would be nice if they had a smart TV in the room with Netflix.
And lastly, this seems to be the same with most hotels, it would be nice if the breakfast could accommodate all dietary needs. I am vegan (not vegetarian) and I think I was only able to have fruit.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The view was nice - that is when we could actually go out on the balcony and not have to deal with the noise. Room was well appointed and the bed was very comfortable.
review.comment_negative:
Unfortunately the noise level was completely unacceptable. There is an open roof karaoke place right across the street with people screaming over loudspeaker for a few hours (until 10pm). There is no soundproofing in the room whatsoever and and even with the balcony doors fully closed, the noise is unbearable. We had to leave the room during that time. Complaints to the staff had no effect, no action was taken to make things right. We were on one of the higher floors, I imagine it could be even worse on the lower floors.

There were few other minor issues like leaking shower cabin or mediocre breakfast quality (especially the eggs!) but we would be fairly happy with the stay if it wasn't for the noise. Until this is fixed I'd definitely recommend staying somewhere else.

review.rating: 全体的には非常に満足のいく滞在となり、おすすめできるホテルである。
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: フロントの方をはじめ、みんなとてもテキパキと働いていて、いろいろ質問をしてもしっかり答えてくれて気持ち良かった。朝食バイキングも、毎日少しずつ変化をつけたメニューで飽きることなく、味も良かった。今回宿泊階では最上階にある海側の部屋に宿泊して、部屋もきれいだし、アメニティーもしっかり揃っていて、シャワーの水圧も申し分無かった。通りを挟んで目の前にビーチがあり、部屋にあるビーチサンダルと、フロントでタオルも借りられた。5階のプールでは、子供用に浮き輪の貸し出しもあって、小さいけれどキッズコーナーもあり、ファミリーフレンドリーなホテルだと感じた。夜ホイアンに行きたかった時、往復で借りられるタクシーを手配してくれて、非常に助かった。
review.comment_negative: 通りを挟んで目の前にバーがあり、夜10時まで25階にいても目の前かのような非常に大きい音で音楽が鳴り響いていたので、小さい子供がいて早く寝たい場合は、海側の部屋ではない方がいいと思う。私たちは金曜と土曜の夜の宿泊だったので、他の日も同じなのかはわからない。部屋に備え付けのシャンプー類は、エコフレンドリーなのかと思うが髪が少しパサパサになったのが残念だった。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 giường đơn nhìn ra cảnh thành phố

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: A little off the path, have to take taxi mostly

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Excellent l’hôtel avec la vue magnifique. Les photos sur booking et la chambre en vrai est exacte le même (c’est rare!). Personnels sont agréables, souriants et professionnels. Beaucoup de choix pour petit déjeuner.

Bref, en tous cas si je reviens à Da Nang, je vais sûrement rester à Sel de mer sans hésiter
review.comment_negative: Le seule point négatif c’est la chambre n’est pas bien isolée, les bruits du resto à côté sont horribles, les gens font karaoke de 19h-23h/23h30 😐

review.rating: Very nice hotel, but plagued by disruptive karaoke noise.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Great breakfast with lots of choices, great staff, quick check in and check out, loved the rain shower and the very comfortable bed, good options on the TV, the location is amazing and the cake on the icing is definitely the balcony with the view (and sound!) of the sea.
review.comment_negative: Blasting noise and flashing lights from the adjacent karaoke bar... the deafening noise levels were just beyond tolerable... it sounded as if they were singing in my own hotel room. I've lived in Vietnam for a while and I know karaoke is like a national sport - but the sound levels that I experienced during my stay, in particular one night, made me reconsider the amount of money I had spent on my room. Honestly, the sheer volume was disrespectful to the many guests of this beautiful hotel. Don't count on taking naps or going to bed early or enjoying the beautiful peace of the balcony during concert hours.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The breakfast was super!

review.comment_positive:
Personale gentile e disponibile.
Organizzazione delle escursioni ottima.
Ottima colazione.
Vicinanza al Mare.
review.comment_negative:
La posizione non è ottimale. Ci sono alcuni locali a fianco ma per la cena è spesso consigliabile andare in altra zona (costo del taxi 100.000 dong sola andata con tassametro, non fidatevi di ciò che dicono all'hotel. A noi hanno detto che il costo era di 200.000 dong e quindi all'andata abbiamo pagato il doppio). 
Nel pomeriggio l'acqua della piscina era fredda (la piscina è posta all'aperto ed affaccia in direzione est, il pomeriggio quindi non prende sole).

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Nhìn ra Đại dương
review.comment_positive:
ホテルスタッフが皆さんが一生懸命お客様のことを考え、対応してくれるところが素晴らしいと感じました。朝食をいただいている時、スタッフの方が話しかけてくださり、観光やマリンスポーツのことをアドバイスしてくださいました。また、バーナーヒルズに行く時もフロントスタッフはとても親切に教えてくれました。ホテルのチャーターバスやGrabを利用することについての細やかに説明してくれました。おかげで不安なくバーナーヒルズに行くこともできました。
お部屋はファミリールーム　オーシャンビューに４泊しました。お部屋からの眺めは最高ですので、オーシャンビューをお勧めします。お部屋の中央にセパレートできる扉があり、TV、トイレも２つあったのがとても便利でした。
朝食は毎日少しずつメニューが変わり、種類も多かったので飽きませんでした。ベトナム料理、洋食などいろいろでおいしくいただきました。
review.comment_negative:
他の方の口コミにあるように、『近隣のカラオケの音がうるさい』ということは確かにありました。しかし、深夜まで続くわけではなかったので許容範囲かと思います。
プールはリゾートホテルの優雅な雰囲気はないのが残念でした。しかし、８月の暑い中でも屋根付きで日陰のプールですので、その点は良かったです。
客室のタオルが古く、柔らかくないのが残念でした。

review.comment_positive:
The quality of the hotel was over our expectations.
But the main point of going there is the staff. Always friendly, extra helpful and always smiling. The prices of the rooms and of the restaurant are really reasonable, you get 5 star quality for 2-3 star prices. I would like to highlight one of the waiters, Bao, who taught us a lot about Vietnamese coffee culture. Finally a huge shoutout to the general manager who is personally helping with any issues and who has a great experience in the industry.

review.rating: Un bon séjour en bord de mer
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
L’hôtel est très beau, les chambres sont spacieuses et lumineuses. La salle de bain est sublime.
Le petit déjeuner est également un point fort, complet et surtout avec un pain très très bon, on sent qu’il est fait maison.
review.comment_negative: Le personnel est vraiment très gentil, parfois si gentil qu’ils veulent presque « trop faire » pour aider. Cela peut être stressant par moment.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
review.comment_positive:
Everything was so exquisite, the color of the interior, the furniture, color lay out, the amenities, and of course the unbeatable ocean view! You can enjoy the view right at your own balcony!
The staff, from the moment you arrived at the entrance, they were extremely attended, ex: proactively press the elevator for you, the check in process they escorted you to your room and gave you a brief with the facility. 
The gym and sauna was good, compare with most other south east Asia hotel.
review.comment_negative: If there could be a make up mirror or area design for lady would be perfect

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The juniorsuite at the upperlevel was most comfortable. I had some problems with the streetnoise and was moved to a quieter higher level in the building. Excellent staff, efficient and friendly.
review.comment_negative: Noise from street and city,  however acceptable.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Wir hatten ein Zimmer mit Meerblick in der 22. Etage. Das war schon super. 
Es liegt am Ende vom Strand. leider hat das Hotel am Strand keine Liegen. zumindest eine Dusche wäre nett gewesen. Wer also Strandurlaub geniessen möchte kann ich dieses Hotel an dieser Stelle nicht empfehlen. 
Hinzu war das Frühstück nicht 5 Sterne würdig. Jeden 2. Tag das gleiche Essen. Echt enttäuschend. 
das schlimmste ist, dass man uns für den Altkleider Sack berechnet. Kostet zwar nur 25K dong. Aber selbst die 3 Sternen Hotels stellen das nicht Rechnung. für mich ein Unding und sollte geändert werden. 
Personal war aber perfekt.
review.comment_negative: Frühstück war jeden 2. Tag gleich

review.comment_positive: We loved everything about this hotel but the standout are the staff. They are amazingly friendly and helpful. Guest services advice saved us a lot of time and money by giving us great advice on day trips. A lovely waitress taught me some helpful vietnamese phrases to use on our trip. The doorman couldn't have been more helpful.  Barman that recommend  to try the spicy chicken wings...they were so yummy, you were totally right that we would love them!Service was flawless and very Japanese in style whist being warm and charming.  The room itself was beautiful, large balcony overlooking the beach. The room was modern, clean a d just right for us. Beds were comfy. Breakfast was yummy with many choices both western and Asian. We would love to come back again and highly  recommend  this hotel. It has knocked our socks off to be our absolute favourite.

口コミにカラオケの音がうるさい！とありましたが、23階だったからかもですが…全然気にならなかったです。
お部屋も、清掃も最高です✨

review.comment_negative:
There is a beach club across the street that plays full blast awful karaoke from. 17:30-22:00.  So bad and loud you can’t sit on the balcony, even on the 25 the floor.
I’m no soprano, but this sounds like a lunatic asylum.  Easy fix would be for the hotel to book the function suite for a few $$$ each weekend and then cut the sound off.  Pool area also small for the hotel size.

review.comment_negative: Terrible coverd and tiny swimming pool and bar facility.  Zero beach facility. If guests have to cross a busy road to access the sand then there should be something for them to enjoy there.  Blaming it on the local council is not good enough.  Room cleaning late - had to ask for it to be done.  Pathethic in-room refreshments and toiletries. Two tiny chairs and a table on a large balcony.  Should not have to ask for a lounger.

review.comment_positive: Fabulous hotel, excellent food, great rooms, views, and awesome team. Pool was terrific with sauna and steam rooms. Great rooftop bar.
review.comment_negative: I was expecting beach frontage. The beach was across a busy road from the hotel. The area around the beach was very run down with few facilities nearby. Some parts looked decidedly dodgy. Great hotel if you're not seeking the beach resort experience.

review.comment_positive:

Room was fantastic and the view is just as reflected in the website; magical.
Service staff was very friendly and accommodating especially Hoang Thuy who was very patient, caring and meticulous. Her warm smile really made our stay here even more pleasant. Same goes to the lobby reception and breakfast reception and room service staff. Truly remarkable.

The Annona Spa at level 4 has a very very nice ambience and the service provided was really worth every cent. Friendly and dedicated staff especially Ms Nhi and Ms Thu.

review.comment_negative:

Also, as the hotel is in front of the beach, its staff regularly wipe the front lobby etc. In the morning, I slipped on the hard floor, just below the front steps. Luckily, I did not do much damage to myself or else I might have landed in a hospital with a broken bone or more.

review.comment_positive: The staff where extremely friendly & helpful. The rooms were large and modern and the bed was extremely comfortable.
review.comment_negative: Unfortunately the hotel is right next door to an extremely loud karaoke bar. We stayed in the hotel for 2 nights and only on the last day did we not hear the awful karaoke. It was so disappointing because the hotel was so nice but the disturbance from the karaoke completely ruined our stay. We were on the 25th Floor and it was still loud enough as if we were actually in the bar itself. It was also playing during the day as we were trying to relax at the pool, to the point that we actually left the hotel pool to try and get away from the noise. I completely understand this is outside of the hotels control and the staff could not have been more apologetic and helpful for everything else.

review.rating: Great hotel, wonderful service, reasonably priced
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is located right next to the beach. On the higher floors you can see both directions along the beach and the fishing boats out to sea. The staff are really friendly and couldn’t have been more helpful. Made us feeling really welcome. Coconut coffee a must. 

As we exercised everyday helped with a late breakfast which was really appreciated. Gym, pool area and roof top bar has great views.
review.comment_negative: Hotel in a busy area, on a busy road. Lots of beach activity including local celebrations which can be noisy. Pool decoration needs finishing albeit lovely location and lots of residents taking photos.

review.rating: Beautiful and wonderful staff, it was a dream.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive:
The room was absolutely beautiful, large and bright, very clean and lots of nice little details. Bathroom was great, separate toilet and shower which we liked. Powerful shower and nice products. Bed was comfy and clean soft sheets. 

The staff were amazingly attentive and always checking on us. Went the extra mile, gave us tips for local areas. One lady translated and arranged for a very precious item we left at a previous destination to be delivered by bus which we were so grateful for. 

The pool was also great, we swam on our own in the pool one evening and it was sheltered so you would be protected from the sun in the daytime. Food was fab for breakfast and we ate there in the evenings. 

If we are in the area again we will 100% come back. Thank you so much. Cam on Ban.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
review.comment_positive:
location is good, just walk across the road to the beach, walk to small supermarkets within 5 mins.  I was told it is a relatively quieter side of the beach which I like.  The room is nice with balcony and can hv a great view of the beach with no blockage.  I read from other reviews that it may be noise during night time, the truth is sometimes there is music at the beach and it will only last till 10pm at night.  The hotel has no control of it cos the music is from the resturant at the beach, yet the hotel keeps monitor the noise and report to police if it is over time.  I stayed there for two nights and one night there is music, however, it stopped before 10pm.  Meanwhile, if you close the balcony, there will hv no sound.  
Staffs at the hotel or at the resturant are supper nice and they are very curious of how is our stay, cos they want to improve their service, can feel every staffs give their heart for their hotel to serve us better.  Definitely i will go back to the same hotel next time.
review.comment_negative: not that i can think of, i enjoy every moment there.

review.rating: Cozy place where you feel you are the only customer.
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
The hotel is right on the beach (across the road), rooms are modern and comfortable. One thing I would like to inform you, if you want to have some good food don't fall for the taxi drivers outside, just turn right on the road and walk down, you will come to a street full of restaurants on both sides of the road. All of these places have good food, just walk along and you can try over 100 places to eat there. I found this road to have lots of good places than the main road where most of these places are large establishments with sea food. There is a Beach Club just 1KM walk down also a good place for drinks and some full moon parties. 

The guest relationship manager was the best, she was always present while check-in, morning breakfast and even while we checked out, I give 100% to her she was a mini Wiki of knowledge, with a big smile. I think this is one of the few hotels who have got it right "customers come first". 

Next time I will definitely be staying here.
review.comment_negative: Now, this is nothing to do with the hotel, but across the road there are two events places, where they do weddings, parties etc. and like anything in Vietnam they have to do karaoke that goes on till 10PM, so if you plan to sleep early good luck with that, lots of these guys think they can sing but believe me its a stretch.

We liked everything: location, rooms, restaurants, pool, fitness etc. Hotel located just in few metres from one the the best beaches. There are many seafood restaurants and small markets nearby. 

The whole staff starting from managers to cleaners and waiters was very helpful. During check- in welcome drink and plate with fresh fruits were provided.  Everyday room was cleaned, sometimes even twice a day:) Breakfast boxes were ready at early check-out even without our request. Breakfast selection and quality was very good. Restaurant food was also delicious and at affordable price.

review.rating: Excellent hotel at a great price in a great location.

review.comment_positive: Exceptional location at a great price. Great views from the room and an incredible breakfast. The hotel is right in front of clear areas of beach and a short walk/taxi ride to restaurants. Food Places near the hotel aren't great but the Hotel itself has great food if you need something but don't want to go far.

review.rating: Great place to stay. Highly recommended.
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: We stayed in the junior suite with ocean view. We asked for the highest possible room as it was our anniversary and they were able to (25th floor) 😊 Room was very spacious, modern, comfy, clean, great view and big TV.  Bathroom very nice especially tub and great ventilation. Good walk-in wardrobe and plenty shelving next to desk to put all our clothes in. We were there for 7 nights so it made our stay more comfortable. Staff friendly and attentive especially the 2 guest relations officers. They would come to speak to us at breakfast every 1-2 days to check how our stay was and would attend to any issues/questions. Our shower drain was very slow to drain and they sent someone to fix it straight away. Room service, house keeping and reception is 24hrs. Free water bottles provided daily and more can be ordered as needed. Bartender named Chi (we think) at Speakeasy Bar on rooftop took great care in making our drinks perfect. Good gym, sauna, steam room and pool. Nice spa treatments. Breakfast buffet had good variety, nice fruit, juices, delicious pho/noodle soups, and great coffee. Room service food was good. We'd definitely stay here again.
review.comment_negative: Nothing really, but just some suggestions for improvement. The pool area would have been better if there was a spa, if glass fence was kept clean to give a clear view of the beach and they played more chilled out music instead of pop/dance (btw I like pop/dance but it didn't feel right here). Windows in rooms could have been better sound proofed as we can hear all the street noise start from 5.30am or if there is a function  across road in evening as they love the volume on the entertainment super loud lol (only happened 1 night luckily). TV would have been better if it allowed screen mirroring so I could watch my Netflix or YouTube off my phone ... or better still if it had Netflix and internet access. Breakfast was overall good, but some dishes could be better e.g. bacon, sausages, and have more hot vegetarian options.

review.rating: Niceish, didn't feel like a 5 star hotel

review.comment_negative: The hotel was in front of a karaoke bar. There were people singing late at night and it was rather loud and not very nice to listen to. I could hear them from level 18. The good thing is they stop after 9.30pm.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
review.comment_positive: Todella ystävällinen ja palveluhenkinen henkilökunta. Hieno ulko uima-allas alue kerrosten välissä katoksen alla, joten tästä pystyy myös sateella ja huonolla säällä nauttimaan. Lisäksi allas-alueen yhteydessä on ilmainen iso saunatila. Hyvä aamupala. Hyvän kokoinen kuntosali. Henkilökunta suositteli nähtävyys kierroksen tilaamista Dacotours nimiseltä yritykseltä, jonka järjestämä kierros Ba Na Hillsillä vastasi hyvin hotellin tasoa. Todella hieno huone hyvillä näkymillä rannalle. Hotelli sijaitsee rannan pohjoisemmassa osassa, joten alueella on hieman rauhallisempaa. Pari ruokakauppaa sijaitsee aivan hotellin vieressä.
review.comment_negative: Kuntosalilla yksi laitteista oli rikki. Söin yhden kerran illallisen hotellin ravintolassa, mutta tämä oli hieman pettymys. Turistien suosima ravintola alue sijaitsee hieman kauempana (noin 3km etelään), joten täytyy usein mennä Grap kyydillä.

review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Our oceanview suite is beautiful & staff is friendly. The live music in the bar on Friday night was fantastic. Breakfast was great.
review.comment_negative:
The glass door dividing the bedroom and bathroom is quite transparent so if lights in the bedroom are on during midnight, it may disturb the other person’s sleeping. 
If you are not used to sleep with the sound of the ocean waves, it can also be a bit of annoying.

review.rating: 最高でした。またダナンに行った時は必ず泊まりたいです。
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: 今回は二人での旅行。泊まったのはジュニアスイート。部屋の広さは申し分無し。家具やベッドの配置に余裕があり、十分なスペースが確保出来ている。バスタブがあるのも嬉しい。朝食も毎日少しずつメニューが変わるので飽きがこない。何と言ってもホテルスタッフのホスピタリティが素晴らしい。ホテルはやっぱり「人」だと思わせてくれたホテルでした。補足として、個人的に重要なWi-Fi環境はとても良好。スピード速いです。シャワーの水圧強くなるし、お湯の熱さも申し分ないです。快適な時間を過ごせました。
review.comment_negative: 部屋の窓が少し薄いのかな？波の音が少し大きく聞こえた。パートナーは波の音が聞こえるのはとても情緒があっていいと言っていたが、僕としては、もう少し音が小さくなってくれた方が嬉しい。良くなかった点を探すならば、これくらいだろうか。

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Da Nang ist wahrscheinlich ist sehr unterschätzt, da sich die Stadt als moderne Metropole mit Flair und Stil entwickelt. Das Hotel ist sehr modern, professionelles Personal mit sehr guten Englischkenntnissen, der Pool ist regengeschützt mit einem wunderschönen Meeresblick und die unmittelbare Lage zum Strand ermöglicht erholsames Verweilen im Sand und Wasser mit lebhaftem Wellengang. Da Nang ist der ideale Ausgangspunkt und die Highlights Vietnams über Tagesausflüge kennenzulernen, wie Hoi An, Hue oder My Son.
review.comment_negative: Nirgendwo wie in Da Nang sieht man die Überkapazitäten an Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten. Riesige Bettenburgen stehen leer und viele Bauprojekte sind im Rohbau hängengeblieben.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
Goede kamer, groot, schoon en faciliteiten zoals gym, sauna, zwembad. 
Kwaliteit van eten ontbijt/diner/skybar is goed. 
Personeel spreekt goed Engels. 

Grote groepen (Korean) zorgen dat ontbijt zaal snel/vol zit in de ochtend, maar doorloop is prima en worst snel aangevuld.

Wij zaten met een aanbieding in dit hotel en dat was prima. Als wij de "originele" prijs (zover die bestaat) hadden betaald (250 euro per nacht) was dat echt te veel geweest.
review.comment_negative:
De skybar en restaurant hebben weinig sfeer. Vaak zaten d'r maar 2 mensen en is het wat eerder afstandelijk dan gezellig borrelen te noemen. 

We wisten dat het hotel wat meer uit het levendige deel lag, en met 10-15 min lopen ben je wel in de gezelligheid, maar de route is langs de boulevard die ook niet overal even leuk is.

Tegenover het hotel is een conventiecentrum  waar ook bruiloften zijn etc. Op drie dagen was dit het geval (van 5 dagen van ons verblijf), de muziek stopt wel stipt om 22uur.

review.comment_positive:
We had a room on the 25th floor, ocean view.. Big room, and balcony.. Big shower. Rooftop bar right above us, but due to post covid, little amount if people..

And then breakfast...best ever. Name it, they had it. Continental, local, full english... Really exceptional.

The swimming pool, sauna, steamroom... Wellness, massage... All making it a great stay.

At 5am the local fishermen start working.. Enjoyed the activity..and later eat it at one of the restaurants.
review.comment_negative:
The water in the swimming pool was rather cold. Sharing a steam room with my wife was not allowed.. Men and women are seperate.. Even in bikini. Boring, so we broke the rules. 
The music on the beach was rather loud.

review.comment_positive:
We recently stayed at Sel de Mer in Da Nang .

I would like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude. 

From the moment we arrived we experienced the most astounding sense of hospitality .  Flights were arranged / day trips booked . Nothing was too much trouble . Breakfast excellent!

All the staff could not do enough to help .  In particular Hoai Man .  He is an asset to any business !  Wish I could steal him to work for me in South Africa . 

Sel de Mer we will be back ! 

Henelia and Louw Massyn 
South Africa

review.comment_negative:
Pas de porte-bagages dans la chambre... Pas pratique pour poser sa valise (et encore moins si on est deux dans la chambre) ! Du coup on a dû utiliser la table du balcon en guise de porte-bagages !
La douche ne comporte aucune étagère, donc impossible d'y poser quel que produit que ce soit (gel douche, shampooing etc.). D'ailleurs il manque des produits de douche... dans la douche ! La logique voudrait dans ce cas que soient vissé dans le mur un distributeur de produits de base (gel douche, shampooing...).

review.comment_positive: Location was in close proximity to the beach strip but still not close to the populated/patrolled sections of the beach. Breakfast was okay with all standard options. The tapas rooftop bar had very good food and drinks.
review.comment_negative: Whilst being geographically close to the beach it isn’t patrolled or populated with vendors, everything is a 5-10minute taxi ride away which was inconvenient for people without a car. We were disappointed overall with the facilities of the hotel. It was often difficult to get a pool towel and the ‘bars’ at the pool and lobby were certainly staffed by inexperienced staff, where we were disappointed with the quality of food and drinks. This hotel was certainly the least favourite of ours whilst travelling in Vietnam.

review.rating: Very comfy and good value for money
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Breakfast variety was fantastic and the service was very good. The views of the sea from the rooms was amazing, particularly the sunrise. Rooms are open spacious and comfy. Though this property was more expensive than all other hotels we booked in Vietnam, the service quality and room comforts and amenities were worth it.  The highlight of our stay in Danang was Esco Bar, which is not too far from the hotel.
review.comment_negative: Location is a bit far from the sites and main bars but it was easy to get around using Grab taxis. The hotel advised us to pay in VND because the exchange rate they use increases the $ value by a lot compared to what was given on Booking.com. We had to pay using a different card which was inconvenient. It would be preferable if prices were set in USD at the time of booking.

The rooms are spacious, clean, well planned and have beautiful views. I do not hesitate in recommending this hotel.

I was really disappointed with the reception staff they just aren’t willing to help out and don’t know what good customer service is - especially for this hotel you would expect reception staff to be polite and helpful!

occassionally you got a bad smell throughout day, but the housekeeping put a fragrancw diffuser so that was rectified.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: This hotel is amazing. From the moment you step in you are treated like royalty. Check in was very smooth and you receive a delicious welcome drink. The room is very spacious and the bed is really comfortable. They hotel had a crib for my baby which made everything better for everyone. Breakfast is 5 stars with excellent local cuisine as well (besides the normal stuff). I really enjoyed trying something new everyday. The rooftop restaurant is also amazing, really good food. The staff is really excellent, amazing people that care about you but Ms Thuong was the angel from the 2nd floor restaurant. She was not only an excellent waiter but she even offered to feed our one year old his meal so that my wife and I could enjoy our dinner. I have only amazing memories at this hotel… The gym, the pool, everything was fantastic. Thank you for such wonderful time.
review.comment_negative: I wish I could stay longer there ☺️

review.rating: Nice hotel if you need to travel to DaNang.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The staff was very helpful and spoke excellent English. The breakfast buffet was excellent. It was easy to grab a ‚Grab‘ cab directly in front of the hotel but no in-App payment, just cash! We drove to charming Hoi An, 30-40 minutes away, every day. The hotel gym was good. The ocean views from rooms, rooftop bar, and pool area were stunning. The rooftop cocktail bar was wonderful- serving excellent cocktails, beautiful and delicious food. The cityscape at night made it worth the higher tab. There was no other restaurant or cafe nearby that we found at all appealing.
review.comment_negative: To access the beach you had to cross the busy street without a traffic light. The stretch of  beach in front of the hotel was very run down and did not permit swimming. The beach was dirty. The pool area and hotel room bath seemed a bit run down. The immediate neighborhood was very run-down residential, no restaurants or retail, lots of abandoned construction, torn up sidewalks, stray dogs. Sadly DaNang city seemed economically troubled and exuded zero charm.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: 部屋のサイズや眺めがとにかく良かった！ホテルの近くに食事や水を買うところもあり、海も目の前。市場や空港へもGrabを使えば全く問題もなく、便利だった。朝食も卵料理やフォーをその場で作ってくれたり、食事のバリエーションも毎日変わるので飽きることなく楽しめた！とにかく大満足！
review.comment_negative: 水回りにいた虫が最後まで清掃されることがなかったが、特に問題はない。

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: We loved the cleanliness and attentiveness of staff. We had an ocean view from our room which was amazing to wake up too. The location of the hotel was a little out of the way, we had to take a Grab everywhere we went.

review.comment_positive: スタッフが丁寧で感じ良かったです。オーシャンビューのバルコニー付き部屋の景色が良く、選んで正解でした。シャワーとバスタブが分かれているのも良い。朝食ビュッフェも美味しかったです。コスパ良いと思います。
review.comment_negative: 特に不満はありませんが、強いて挙げるなら、掃除の時間が遅いことくらいでしょうか（2時頃？）。街の中心部へは少し遠いですが、Grabですぐに車を呼べるので問題無し。

review.rating: Splendid! Sel de Mer makes a great holiday stay for my family. We would definitely recommend!
review.room_type: Suite 3 Phòng Ngủ Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The room - very comfortable - love especially the jacuzzi and shower room, the service of the staff (super prompt, great service and very attentive), the snack bar at the top floor where we were able to enjoy the international fireworks while chomping down the best snacks. My family also like the buffet breakfast - the servers are very friendly and would engage us in conversation. The reception was great too! They are super attentive and would help us arrange for transport, or pay close attention to our needs ie if we needed extra towels / change of key cards etc. Enjoyed also the infinity pool and the sauna and steam bath. It is less than 3mins walking distance to the beach. All adds up - My whole family of 8 really enjoyed the stay.

review.rating: Incredible staff and facilities BOOK HERE!
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Everything. The staff are so accommodating you get made to feel like royalty nothing is too much for them. The rooms are so so clean the pool is incredible and the sauna and steam room too. The roof top bar is beautiful and had live music on one of the nights. Location is right next to the beach. They gave us a free room upgrade for the whole of our stay because there was a noise issue the first night which wasn't even their fault...it was from karaoke which is actually quite far away and a resident who can't be told to be quiet until 10pm. I am a very light and early sleeper so I struggled with this but in the new room it was peaceful and quiet. The staff immediately changed our rooms and upgraded us to a suite. The suite was exceptional. Huge and I highly recommend the upgrade if on the fence even though our first room was beautiful. The buffet breakfast is amazing too a great selection of healthy food that's cooked for you. I had a fresh omelette with salad and a yoghurt with fruit every day my partner went for traditional Vietnamese brekkie which he loved - they even have fresh sourdough and rye bread. I love this hotel it's been my favourite in Vietnam.
review.comment_negative: I think the breakfasts could go on till later. I don't usually eat until 11am so perhaps until 12. Especially on the weekends.

review.rating: Good value with superb service and fantastic view.
review.room_type: Suite Junior Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Excellent service by all of the staff - Huong Thuy was particularly good. Well done! Great ocean views including views of the standing Buddha and views up and down the beach strip. Very large room with great facilities. Good breakfast with lots of options. Great bar on the 26th floor. In a good location. We had a junior suite that was fantastic value. Great restaurants nearby.

review.rating: Great give star stay in Danang
review.room_type: Phòng Superior 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Đại Dương
review.comment_positive:
From the moment we arrived, the staff were fantastic. I’ve stayed in many hotels and this is some of the best service I’ve ever had. We arrived at 10am and had planned to leave our bags and head out but our room was ready for us which was a nice bonus.

The room was a decent size and was clean. The beds were comfortable and the air con worked well. The balcony was a good size and would have had a lovely view if it wasn’t so foggy. Having a separate door on the toilet was a nice touch.

The steam room, sauna and pool were nice but the pool was freezing. We still enjoyed our swim and cocktails by the pool!

Breakfast was good as were the cocktails at the rooftop bar.

There was a loud party across the street at night but the GRO spoke to each group individually at breakfast and apologised which was unnecessary but showed good care.

For the price, this hotel is definitely worth it!!
review.comment_negative: The room didn’t feel small but because of the layout, there wasn’t really anywhere to lay the suitcase out except on the bed.

review.comment_positive: Wir waren fünf Tage im Hotel. Die Zimmer waren super komfortabel, Bett sehr bequem und die Dusche super geräumig. Es war immer sauber, Zimmerservice somit auch klasse. Das Frühstück war nicht unbedingt ein Highlight, aber solide. Man hat eine gewisse Auswahl - wir konnten uns damit arrangieren. WLAN hat immer und im gesamten Gebäude super funktioniert. Der Fitnessraum ist ausreichend ausgestattet, so dass man die meisten Basic Übungen und Workouts durchführen kann. Zum Schluss das Beste am Hotel: die Mitarbeiter. Super freundlich, immer hilfsbereit und respektvoll.
review.comment_negative: Der Pool war eine der größten Enttäuschungen. Dort kann man nicht wirklich entspannen. Zum einen zu wenig liegen und zum anderen eigentlich keine Sonne, da überdacht. Ebenfalls etwas nervig waren die Aufzüge. Manchmal ist man fünf Min oder länger unterwegs 😒

review.comment_positive: 직원들도 친절하고 시설도 수영장이랑 헬스장 등 깨끗하게 잘 갖춰져있어요. 객실도 패밀리룸 예약했는데 친구들이랑 3명이서 편하게 썼습니다. 조식도 베트남식이랑 서양식 같이 섞어서나와서 먹을것도 충분합니다. 직원들이 고객의 이력을 외우고 그에 맞는 서비스를 제공해주는 마인드가 감동스러운 곳입니다. 위치도 근처에 마트있어서 맥주사러 나가기도 편하고 그랩을 부르면 어디든 10분 안에 가는 좋은 위치입니다.
review.comment_negative: 아쉬웠던 점을 찾아보기가 어려웠음

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
미케비치 바로 앞에 있어서 바닷가 접근이 쉬웠으며 걸어서 마트도 가까웠다.
숙소 내 청결상태가 좋았다. 오토바이를 대여를 원한다고 했더니 렌트업체에서 호텔까지 가져다줬으며 오토바이 주차장도 실내에 있어서 쾌적하게 이용하기 좋았다.
비오는 날엔 주차장에서 우산도 씌워주시고 모든 직원이 매우 친절했다. 2박을 했는데 조식이 매번 달라서 좋았다.
에어컨을 틀면 금방 시원해져서 오래 틀어둘 필요가 없었다.
review.comment_negative: 수영장 물이 좀 차가웠다.

review.rating: Just choose this place! It’s awesome!!❤️❤️
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Có Giường Cỡ King Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive:
We stayed for 2 nights and it was so simply marvelous! 
It was mid-October and the weather was not that good rainy and cold, so we didn't want to move out of the hotel. And we had a great time! All the staff was so kind and detailed. Special thanks go to Mr. Tran Quoc Hoang (Food and Beverage Manager) - thanks for giving us your business card, otherwise I would never write your name correctly 😄. He was very kind, attentive, and positive. Such a shame we don't have all the names of the staff to thank them, but just know you are great! 

Spa, sauna, swimming pool - all was good and beautiful. The room was comfy and stylish. Thank you for the bathrobes and sleepers. The ocean view was stunning. 
We simply don't have any complaints, despite the fact one lady from reception kindly had asked us every morning “Is there anything you would like to complain about?” And the answer was all the same “Absolutely not! Sorry 😄” We had stayed at so many hotels, I wish many of them would had asked the same question and believe me we had something to say about 🙈. 

So, overall, guys, you all are great and we are greatfull for the stay! We wish you luck and nice guests. 
For sure if we are around, we are going to comeback to you place ❤️

Tanya and Alex ❤️

review.comment_positive:
Wonderful stay. Staff is extremely polite and always smiling. Special thanks to Mr Man (Relationship Officer) for his extremely polite and welcoming nature.
And Ms Hong Nhi on the breakfast floor is a very sweet and was very helpful especially to my wife finding all eggless food due to allergic to eggs.

Perfect location for hotel and breakfast buffet  is fantastic.

review.rating: Aufenthalt war ganz ok, aber nichts besonderes
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Unser Hotelzimmer, im höchsten Stock, war wunderschön, wirklich tolle Aussicht auf das Meer, sehr gross geschnitten, bequemes Bett sowie sehr sauber. Leider hat uns jedoch das Hotel trotz des schönen Zimmers nicht überzeugen können.
review.comment_negative: Das Hotel liegt direkt am Strand, nur eine Hauptstrasse ist zu überqueren. Leider ist dieser Strandabschnitt nicht sauber, hat keine Liegen oder Sonnenschirme. Wir sind der Meinung, dass auch das Hotel etwas zur Sauberkeit betragen sollte, schliesslich wird auch dafür geworben. Die Mitarbeiter sind nur teilweise freundlich und man wird kaum wahrgenommen. Die Vietnamesische Gastfreundschaft war leider nicht spürbar... Der Frühstücksraum ist sehr voll und dementsprechend laut. Die Speisen und Getränke sind ok aber nichts besonderes... Wir haben meistens ausserhalb gegessen. Dort war es nicht nur günstiger sondern auch deutlich besser. Besonders enttäuschend war der Poolbereich. Der Poolbereich liegt komplett im Schatten, daher ist das Wasser wirklich eisig kalt und das trotz den heissen Temperaturen. Ebenso sind nur sehr wenige Liegen, welche ebenfalls im Schatten sind, verfügbar, sowie liegt der Poolbereich im zweiten Stock... Wie am Anfang erwähnt direkt an einer sehr gut befahrenen Hauptstrasse. Auch wenn man somit nur am Pool liegen will, wird man ständig von hupenden Autos gestört... So haben wir unsere Ferien leider nicht vorgestellt. Im Grossen und Ganzen war es ok, wir würden jedoch nicht wiederkommen bzw. das Hotel weiterempfehlen, da gibt es deutlich bessere für den ähnlichen Preis.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: Everything was great and well organised. No complaints. The gym was excellent with an amazing view of the sea. The pool was amazing too. Not enough words to say how professional and luxurious the room was. This was one of best hotel experiences.
review.comment_negative: Everything at this hotel was well organised, clean and the facilities were excellent. With exceptional views of the sea and a very good breakfast. There really is nothing to complain about this place.

review.comment_positive: Hotel was clean and new. Staff were amazing, friendly and helpful. Everyone spoke english and made our stay very pleasant. Although this isn't a big Hotel compared to the Big players, They certainly made up for it for the value, the top grade services. Facilities was surprisngly good, The hotel boasted a full Gym, Steam room, Sauna and infinity pool with full bar! We had an amazing unblocked view of the ocean from our room. Absolutely stunning.
review.comment_negative: The only downside is the noise from the beach bars.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Biển
Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King Với Ban Công - Nhìn Ra Biển
review.comment_positive: The room and the view were amazing.  It was clean and spacious, and the balcony was actually big enough to sit on and enjoy the amazing sunrises and sunset.  The indoor/ outdoor pool was very nice especially during the mid day sun.  The beach was just a short walk from the hotel and was clean and the water was wonderful.  The hotel restaurant was delcious, and the included breakfast had something for everyone.  The hotel staff were friendly, professional, and very helpful.  I would definitely stay here again.
review.comment_negative: I can't think of anything I didn't like about this hotel.
